url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Vampires/Example Vampires/Vampire Spawn/Vampire Spawn/Creating a Vampire Spawn/Weaknesses

sections.body: A vampire spawn has the same weaknesses of the vampire that created it.

sections.name: Resurrection Vulnerability
sections.url: pfsrd://Monster Codex/Rules/Vampires/Example Vampires/Vampire Spawn/Vampire Spawn/Creating a Vampire Spawn/Weaknesses/Resurrection Vulnerability

sections.body: : A raise dead or similar spell cast on a vampire spawn destroys it (Will negates). Using the spell in this way does not require a material component.

name: Weaknesses
